sentences.en: Author point out emphatically: onus of proof is a legal liability of litigant, not other organization.
sentences.cn: 笔者强调指出: 举证责任是诉讼当事人的一项法律责任, 并不是其它机关的责任.

sentences.en: I believe the onus are upon us to vote down the project.
sentences.cn: 我变为我有责任否决这项工程.

sentences.en: I believe the onus is upon us to vote down the project.
sentences.cn: 我认为我有责任否决这项工程.

sentences.en: Never has technology or our relationship to it had such an onus.
sentences.cn: 技术以及我们与技术的关系从来不像现在这样成了一项重担.

sentences.en: Seeking answers, some call for increased education, some put the onus on parents.
sentences.cn: 追其解决办法, 一些人呼吁要加强教育力度, 还有人认为父母应该担负起责任.

sentences.en: The main onus here is on China.
sentences.cn: 这件事的主要责任在中国.

sentences.en: The onus is on companies and consumers to keep up with anti-virus updates.
sentences.cn: 公司和用户有责任跟上杀毒软件的更新。

sentences.en: The onus is on employers to follow health and safety laws.
sentences.cn: 雇主有义务遵行健康安全法。

sentences.en: The onus is on the shopkeeper to provide goods which live up to the quality of their description.
sentences.cn: 店主有义务提供质量与其描述相符的商品。

sentences.en: The onus is on university presidents to strike a balance in the dilemma.
sentences.cn: 大学的校长,就需要在这张力之间找出平衡.

sentences.en: The onus of proof is on plaintiff.
The onus of proof is reversed in libel actions and placed firmly on the defender.
sentences.cn: 在诽谤诉讼中，举证责任反过来由辩方全权承担。

sentences.en: The onus of proof lies with you.
The other guys need to pass ball, but the onus doesn't fall on them.
sentences.cn: 其他队员需要传球, 但这并不意味着他们会自动担起传球的责任.
